item.title: Cockpit and Data Visualization Company Dashboard Production - Upwork
item.description:
In the context of a consulting engagement with a customer, we We are looking for a professional data visualization service provider to develop the Data Visualization Workstream of that project.
The project has 2 main milestores.
One around the production of a static cockpit with the existing data model, where due to the nature of the consulting job, time to create the prototype and number of revisions are key.  
Another is a sprint based project whose outcomes/milestones are:
1. Datamodel validation and implementation
2. Dashboard(s) design and prototyping
3. Development and Integration Sprint
4. Testing and Validation
5. Training and Documentation
6. Launch and support

- validating existing data model  are and develop a comprehensive dashboard and company cockpit. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating visually appealing and user-friendly dashboards that effectively present complex data. The main responsibilities of the role include understanding the client's requirements, gathering and analyzing data, and designing interactive visualizations that provide meaningful insights. The successful candidate should be proficient in data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js. Strong communication and problem-solving skills are crucial for this role.
*Global Project Objectives*

Skills required:

- Data visualization
- Dashboard design and development
- Data analysis
- Proficiency in Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication skills

Budget: $850

item.title: Financial Dashboard Development for Small Restaurant - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced developer to create a financial dashboard (Power BI) for our small restaurant based on bookkeeping entries. The dashboard should provide a clear overview of our financial performance, including income, expenses, profit margins, and cash flow. It should also allow us to track key financial metrics and generate customizable reports. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of bookkeeping principles and experience in developing financial dashboards.

Skills needed:
- Strong proficiency in data visualization tools
- Experience with bookkeeping and financial analysis
- Knowledge of restaurant industry financial metrics
- Expertise in creating customizable reports

This is a small-sized project and we expect it to be completed within 1 month.

Expertise level: Intermediate

item.title: Power BI Dashboard Builder - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an English-speaking Power BI expert to assist us in building interactive and visually appealing dashboards. As part of this project, you will be working with multiple data sources to create comprehensive and informative reports. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of data analysis and visualization techniques, as well as experience in working with Power BI.

  Responsibilities:
  - Collaborate with our team to gather requirements and identify key performance indicators
  - Design and develop Power BI dashboards using various visualization techniques
  - Clean and transform raw data from multiple sources to ensure accuracy and consistency
  - Create interactive reports that provide in-depth insights into business metrics
  - Troubleshoot and resolve any issues with data connections, queries, or visualizations

  Required Skills:
  - Proficiency in Power BI and its various components
  - Strong knowledge of data modeling and visualization best practices
  - Experience in working with multiple data sources, including SQL databases and Excel files
  - Ability to transform complex data into clear and meaningful visualizations
  - Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with team members

  This is a medium-sized project expected to last between 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level professional with experience in Power BI development and data visualization. If you are passionate about turning data into actionable insights and have a proven track record in Power BI, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00

Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel

item.title: PowerBI Prototype Dashboard Design - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced UI/UX Designer to create polished and user-friendly designs for a Power BI dashboard. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in designing data visualizations and dashboards, particularly within the Power BI environment. Your designs will need to match the available functionality in Power BI, ensuring a seamless integration between design and functionality.

Responsibilities:

- Create visually appealing and intuitive UI/UX designs that align with the functionality and capabilities of Power BI.
- Ensure that the designs enhance the user experience, making data easy to interpret and actionable.
- Develop design mockups, wireframes, and prototypes that clearly illustrate the dashboard layout and functionality.
- Stay updated with the latest design trends and best practices in UI/UX design and data visualization.
Requirements:

- Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing your skills in designing dashboards and data visualizations.
- Proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, or similar.
- Experience designing for Power BI and a good understanding of its capabilities and limitations.
- Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
- Ability to create clean, modern, and intuitive designs that enhance the user experience.
- Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics.

Deliverables:
- Up to five design prototypes for five different screens in a Power BI dashboard

Hourly Range: $17.00-$44.00

item.title: Power BI | Data Scientist| Programmer Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an analyst on a part-time or full-time basis who can work many hours a week depending on availability and skillset (any time zone is fine)

You will be required to log on remotely to complete certain tasks. Time is required or we can switch to a per-milestone contract

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer. Microsoft PowerBI installed

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Create a report from SQL DB (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, Snowflake)
-Finding insights and drawing conclusions
- Statistical analysis
- Advanced knowledge of Python| R
-Creating reports or dashboards in PowerBI or PowerPoint
-Asking questions, and figuring out answers to problems by being proactive



NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER who JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone who can provide solutions and ASK QUESTIONS.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

40% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

20 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements

-Use current and emerging Statistics, Machine Learning and Data Science methods
Innovate new analytic solutions that serve unmet customer needs
communicate analytical results clearly and succinctly-
-Work closely with me to make value-added analytical services available to stakeholders
-Be creative, collaborative in nature, and a self-starter

Must have:
PowerBI
SQL (CTE's, window functions, etc)
Understanding of statistics using R or Python
Some knowledge of statistical viz packages such as JMP, SAS



Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Data Analyst - LATAM - Upwork
item.description:
Role Description

The Data Analyst is responsible for managing, cleaning, analyzing, interpreting, and displaying data to transform it into meaningful statistics, information, and explanations. Success in this role is measured by the ability to turn raw data into goal-driven information and insight that can be used to make business decisions.


Responsibilities:

• Data Management

· Set up all Data Management processes, including:
▪ Data Quality
▪ KPI Development

▪ New Data Sources

· Lead and own the KPI requirements and specification process.
· Establish processes to identify, report, and test data quality problems and fixes.

· Use statistical tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets.
· Work with the engineering team to identify process improvement opportunities, propose system modifications, and devise data governance strategies.



• Analysis

· Work with team leads to understand and maintain focus on analytical needs, including identifying critical metrics and KPIs and delivering actionable insights to relevant decision-makers.
· Proactively analyze data to answer key questions from stakeholders or out of self-initiated curiosity with an eye for what drives business performance, investigating and communicating areas for improvement in efficiency and productivity.
· Prepare and maintain analysis reports and visuals for leadership.




What We’re Looking For:

· 1-3 years’ high-level experience in data analysis, including demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases.
· Technical proficiency in database design development, data models, techniques for data mining, and segmentation.
· Knowledge of programming languages like SQL, Oracle, R, MATLAB, and Python.
· Adept at using data processing and data visualization platforms, specifically Google BigQuery and Microsoft Power BI.
· Exceptional attention to detail and a strong ability to interpret both qualitative and quantitative data.
· Able to build validation and data quality rules to ensure data usability and reduce process iterations
· Excellent communication and presentation skills, with a strong ability to turn complicated problems into simple solution frameworks and represent data in visually impactful ways to “tell a story.”
· Excited about joining a startup culture and opportunity to shape the direction of an emerging vertical in a burgeoning market.
· Flexibility to work across any US time zone with required overlap hours of 9am-3 pm PST
· Collaborate with on and offshore teams

Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:56 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:BigQuery, Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, MATLAB, Python, R
Skills: BigQuery, Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, MATLAB, Python, R
Country: United States

item.title: Data Analyst / Automation Specialist with Amazon expertise - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst / Automation Specialist with Amazon expertise. This role involves setting up and managing automated data collection, processing, and report generation. You will create real-time dashboards, import data from Amazon and 3rd party sources such as Smart Scout, DataHawk, create automated reports, and provide actionable insights to our Amazon clients.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Automate data collection from Amazon tools (e.g., Seller Central, Amazon Advertising, Helium 10).
- Develop processes for data integration and reporting focused on Amazon metrics.
- Create and maintain real-time dashboards and automated reports.
- Analyze Amazon data for actionable insights and recommendations.
- Ensure data accuracy and integrity.
- Customize reports based on client needs.

**Technical Skills Required:**

- Proficiency in data analytics tools (e.g., Google Data Studio, Tableau, Power BI).
- Experience with Amazon tools (e.g., Helium 10, Jungle Scout, Amazon Advertising Console).
- Knowledge of API data integration and automation.
- Understanding of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes.
- In-depth knowledge of Amazon metrics and SEO.

**Additional Skills:**

- Attention to detail and strong analytical skills.
- Clear communication of complex data insights.
- Project management skills.

**Qualifications:**

- Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Marketing, or related field.
- Proven experience in data analytics and automation, focusing on Amazon.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.
- Strong English communication skills.

**Benefits:**

- Competitive compensation.
- Flexible working hours.
- Opportunity for growth and long-term collaboration.

**How to Apply:**

Submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience. Include any work samples or portfolio links. Specifically interested in dashboard samples and market sizing reports.

**About Us:**

At AMZ Research, we are a  e-commerce research and consulting firm focused on Amazon sellers. We deliver data-driven insights through marketing research reports and automated services to help businesses succeed on Amazon.

Thank you for your time reading this far and we look forward to meeting you!

item.title: Senior Power BI Developer Consultant ( Supply Chain) - Upwork
item.description:
About Saint Laurent Consulting:
Saint Laurent Consulting is at the forefront of driving transformation and innovation within cloud data analytics, with a strong ambition to become a Microsoft partner. Specializing in industries such as Supply Chain, Finance, and Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG), our goal is to leverage advanced analytics tools, particularly Power BI, to provide insightful, data-driven solutions that empower our clients. Our team is passionate about delivering excellence and innovation in every project, aiming to set new standards in the consulting arena. By joining us, you'll contribute to meaningful projects that not only challenge the status quo but also have a real impact on businesses navigating the digital landscape.


Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Power BI Developer to join our dynamic team at Saint Laurent Consulting. The ideal candidate will be deeply entrenched in the world of data analytics, with a profound understanding of data modeling, advanced DAX functions, and an ability to weave intricate data narratives that drive strategic business decisions.


Key Responsibilities:
Develop comprehensive Power BI reports and dashboards that succinctly summarize complex data sets, tailored to client-specific requirements.
Construct and maintain robust data models to support dynamic and scalable reporting solutions.
Employ advanced DAX functions to extract, transform, and analyze data, ensuring accuracy and relevancy.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate business needs into technical specifications.
Provide insights and recommendations on data strategy, particularly in the realms of Supply Chain, Finance, and Consumer Packaged Goods.
Lead training sessions and workshops for clients and internal teams, enhancing their competency in utilizing Power BI tools.
Stay abreast of the latest industry trends and advancements in Power BI and data analytics, continuously seeking ways to improve our offerings.

Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Analytics, or a related field.
Minimum of 5 years of experience in data analysis and reporting, with at least 3 years focused on Power BI development.
Proficiency in data modeling and extensive experience with DAX.
Demonstrated ability to translate complex datasets into clear and compelling visualizations.
Strong problem-solving skills and an analytical mindset.
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities, with a knack for simplifying complex concepts for non-technical stakeholders.


Preferred:
Familiarity with Supply Chain Finance and a deep understanding of the Consumer Packaged Goods industry.
Experience with SAP landscapes and cloud data solutions.
Prior consultancy experience or working in a client-facing role.
Certifications in Power BI or other relevant analytics tools.

Contract length: 12 months

Benefits:
Flexible schedule
Work from home

Schedule:
Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00

item.title: Power BI Report Writer Consultant - Upwork
item.description:
Power BI Report Writer Consultant

Job Summary:
The Power BI Report Writer will be responsible for creating, maintaining, and optimizing interactive reports and dashboards using Microsoft Power BI. This role involves working closely with business stakeholders to understand their data needs, designing insightful visualizations, and ensuring the accuracy and relevance of the reports. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, a good understanding of data visualization principles, and experience in leveraging Power BI to transform data into actionable insights.
Key Responsibilities:
1 Report Development:
• Design and develop interactive Power BI reports and dashboards based on business requirements.
• Utilize DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) to create complex measures and calculated columns.
• Implement best practices in report design to ensure clarity, usability, and performance.

2 Data Analysis and Visualization:
• Conduct data analysis to uncover trends, patterns, and insights.
• Create compelling visualizations that effectively communicate data insights to stakeholders.
• Ensure data accuracy and integrity in all reports and dashboards.

3 Requirement Gathering and Stakeholder Collaboration:
• Work with business users to gather and document reporting requirements.
• Translate business requirements into technical specifications for Power BI reports.
• Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis to support business decision-making.
•
4 Data Integration and Management:
• Connect to various data sources, including databases, cloud services, and APIs.
• Perform data transformations and data modeling to support reporting needs.
• Ensure data quality and consistency across all reports and dashboards.

5 Performance Optimization:
• Optimize Power BI reports for performance and scalability.
• Implement data governance and performance tuning practices to ensure efficient data retrieval and rendering.

6 Training and Support:
• Provide training and support to end-users on Power BI functionalities and best practices.
• Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Power BI reports and data sources.

7 Continuous Improvement:
• Stay updated with the latest features and updates in Power BI and related technologies.
• Propose and implement improvements to existing reports and dashboards to enhance their effectiveness and efficiency.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Analytics, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, or a related role.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Power BI, including Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service.
• Strong knowledge of DAX, Power Query, and SQL.
• Experience in designing and developing interactive reports and dashboards.
• Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with other BI tools like Tableau or QlikView.
• Knowledge of data warehousing and ETL processes.
• Certification in Power BI or related Microsoft technologies.

Key Competencies:
• Strong attention to detail and a commitment to data accuracy.
• Good understanding of data visualization principles and best practices.
• Ability to translate complex data into clear and actionable insights.
• Proactive attitude and a passion for continuous learning and improvement.

item.title: Senior Power BI Engineer consultant needed for project - Upwork
item.description:
Senior Power BI Engineer Consultant

Job Summary:

The Senior Power BI Engineer will play a crucial role in the design, development, and maintenance of an enterprise-level BI project using Microsoft Power BI. This role requires a deep understanding of data architecture, advanced Power BI development skills, and the ability to collaborate with various stakeholders to deliver high-quality, data-driven insights. The ideal candidate will possess strong technical expertise, a strategic mindset, and a passion for leveraging data to drive business success.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Power BI Development and Architecture:

• Design, develop, and maintain complex Power BI dashboards and reports.
• Architect scalable and efficient data models to support reporting needs.
• Implement best practices for Power BI development, including data transformations, DAX calculations, and visualization techniques.

2. Data Integration and Management:

• Extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from various sources into Power BI.
• Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and security throughout the data lifecycle.
• Collaborate with data engineers and database administrators to optimize data pipelines and storage solutions.

3. Requirement Gathering and Analysis:

• Work closely with business stakeholders to understand their data needs and translate them into technical specifications.
• Conduct thorough data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights.

4. Performance Optimization:

• Optimize Power BI reports and dashboards for performance and user experience.
• Implement data governance and performance tuning practices to ensure optimal system performance.

5. Continuous Improvement:

• Stay updated with the latest advancements in Power BI, data analytics, and BI tools.
• Propose and implement improvements to existing BI solutions to enhance their effectiveness and efficiency.


Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Science, or a related field.
• 5+ years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, or data engineering.
• Expert-level proficiency in Microsoft Power BI, including Power BI Desktop, Power BI Service, and Power BI Report Server.
• Strong knowledge of data modeling, DAX, Power Query, and SQL.
• Proven experience in designing and implementing complex BI solutions.
• Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with cloud platforms such as Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud.
• Knowledge of additional BI tools like Tableau, QlikView, or Looker.
• Certification in Power BI or related Microsoft technologies.

Key Competencies:
• Strong business acumen and understanding of various industry domains.
• Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality, accurate data solutions.
• Ability to translate complex technical concepts into easy-to-understand business insights.
• Proactive attitude and a continuous learning mindset.

item.title: Power BI Expert for Commodities Position Reporting Tool - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a Power BI expert who can leverage their expertise in pulling data from our REST API and multiple web sources to create a comprehensive commodities position reporting tool. The ideal candidate should be well-versed in Power BI and have a strong understanding of data extraction and visualization techniques. The main responsibilities of this role include developing and designing interactive visualizations, identifying trends and patterns in data, and creating insightful reports for decision-making purposes.

Understanding multiple data sets including purchase and sales contracts, stock on hand, mark to market are required.

An accounting background would also be beneficial

   Required skills:
   - Power BI expertise
   - Data extraction from REST API
   - Data extraction from multiple web sources
   - Data visualization and reporting
- Commodities trading or position report skills prefered.

   This is a medium-sized project that is expected to be completed within 2 to 4 months. The chosen candidate should have an intermediate to high level of expertise in Power BI and data manipulation.

   If you have a passion for data analysis, experience in creating reporting tools, and a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and contribute to the development of a powerful commodities position reporting solution!

item.title: Data Analyst - Automated Reports and Data Visualization - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a mid-level Data Analyst to assist in creating automated reports and data visualization using our BI tool with Postgres data.

The job requires mainly to write SQL queries that answer specific questions we will provide, and document the query. Our data are about streaming and subscriptions, so any previous experience with that will be appreciated.

Our data lives in a Postgres database and our Visualisation tool is Cluvio - you don't need to know the tool as it's very simple.

We will need someone for around 10-15 hours a week on an ongoing basis, but if available we would need more hours in the beginning for some one-off work.

You will be working at your own schedule, but we would need at least one alignment call per week to review the backlog and check the deliverables.

Potential candidates that get shortlisted will need to have a 20' call with our CTO to verify the skills.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in SQL and experience working with Postgres databases
- Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
- Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Experience with subscription data highly preferred

Hourly Range: $24.00-$54.00

Category: Data Visualization
Skills:SQL, Business Intelligence, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, PostgreSQL
Skills: SQL, Business Intelligence, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, PostgreSQL
